DOC.brief_summary: Cannabis is the most commonly used illicit substance in the US and herbal cannabis consists of a number of cannabinoids including Δ-9 THC and CBD. This study will characterize the interactive effects of the two major components of cannabis i.e. Δ-9-THC and CBD.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Cannabidiol and ∆-9-THC in Humans
DOC.criteria: Exposed to Cannabis at least once in lifetime Cannabis Naive
